/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in hues of red and yellow, stand out against the clear blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the buildings and creating a lens flare in the image.
